description:
go.talks: add 'go at google'
Keynote from Oct 25, 2012 by Rob Pike at ACM SPLASH conference.

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6566ce399759&repo=talks ***

go.talks: add 'go at google'
Keynote from Oct 25, 2012 by Rob Pike at ACM SPLASH conference.

R=adg, dchest
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6777060

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/6777060/diff/1/2012/splash.slide
File 2012/splash.slide (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6777060/diff/1/2012/splash.slide#newcode779
2012/splash.slide:779: Several big services uses it:
s/uses/use/

It was recorded and I'm told it will be made available. I have no idea
when or where.

-rob

LGTM

modulo the typo pointed out by dchest

subject: code review 6777060: go.talks: add 'go at google'
